id.title: ID
id.description: Unique identifier (to be written in small letters - for internal usage only).

type.title: Type
type.description: Type of asset, eq. blockchain or token.

name.title: Name
name.description: The official name of the asset.

symbol.title: Symbol
symbol.description: One to nine characters (to be written in capital letters).

token_properties.title: Token properties
token_properties.description: Properties of token. Valid only for tokens.

platform.title: Properties
platform.description: Blockchain where the asset is being run.

decimals.title: Decimals
decimals.description: The number of digits that come after the decimal place when displaying token values on screen (format number).

forked_from.title: Forked from
forked_from.description: The currency from which the asset was forked.

platform.title: Platform
platform.description: Blockchain, currency from which the asset was forked.

block_height.title: Block height
block_height.description: Block height where the fork was.

max_supply.title: Max supply
max_supply.description: Maximum size of coins that will ever exist for a crypto currency (format number).

first_distribution.title: First distribution
first_distribution.description: Amount and type of coins that were released before mining.

title.title: Title
title.description: The kind of the first distribution, eg. Premined / ICO parts / nothing, can be empty.

amount.title: Amount
amount.desctiption: Number of coins in that part (format number).

ico_properties.title: ICO properties
ico_properties.description: Information regarding to ICO (if there is).

start_date.title: Start date
start_date.description: The date when ICO has started (format YYYY/MM/DD).

end_date.title: End date
end_date.description: The date when ICO has ended (format YYYY/MM/DD).

total_cap.title: Total cap
total_cap.description: The total amount of the coins for ICO (format number).

ico_price.title: ICO price
ico_price.description: The amount that was charged for one coin during the ICO.

raised.title: Raised
raised.description: The amount that was raised during the ICO.

country.title: Country
country.description: Country where the ICO is settled.

denominations.title: Denominations
denominations.description: Units and subunits of the asset amount.

plural.title: Plural
plural.description: The name of the denomination, in plural.

unit.title: Unit
unit.description: The subunits of the asset (format number).

name.title: Name
name.description: Name of the denomination (eg. satoshi / lites / photons / litoshis ...).

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: The day when the assets began to be first activated (format YYYY/MM/DD).

web.title: Web
web.desctiption: Official web page of the project (format https://).
